title: Highlights from MarketWatch's New Financial Face-off Column
description: MarketWatch personal-finance deputy editor and author of the "Financial Face-off" column Leslie Albrecht and MarketWatch managing editor Steven Kutz discuss the most interesting questions from MarketWatch's Financial Face-off column, from whether it's better to lease a car or buy a car, to whether it's better to get a cat or a dog.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
